Module chav1961.purelib
Package chav1961.purelib.basic.growablearrays

Class InOutGrowableCharArray

java.lang.Object
chav1961.purelib.basic.growablearrays.GrowableCharArray<InOutGrowableCharArray>
chav1961.purelib.basic.growablearrays.InOutGrowableCharArray
All Implemented Interfaces:
CharStreamPrinter<InOutGrowableCharArray>, java.io.Closeable, java.io.Flushable, java.lang.Appendable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.lang.CharSequence
public class InOutGrowableCharArray
extends GrowableCharArray<InOutGrowableCharArray>
implements CharStreamPrinter<InOutGrowableCharArray>

This class implements CharStreamPrinter interface for GrowableCharArray class. It allow the class use print and println methods to put data into. It implements CharStreamPrinter interface, not extends PrintStream or PrintWriter classes, because these classes suppress all IOException during call and there is no guarantee for successful completion of it's methods

This class is not thread-safe.

Since:
0.0.3
Author:
Alexander Chernomyrdin aka chav1961
See Also:
JUnit tests
LastUpdate:
0.0.4
